title: Cancel a Scheduled Bill Payment
description: A customer scheduled a bill payment but now needs to cancel it before it is sent.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and locate the scheduled bill payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the upcoming payment to the utility company.

tasks.description: Verify that the payment has not yet been processed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the payment is still in 'Scheduled' status.

tasks.description: Cancel the scheduled payment and confirm the cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully cancels the payment and informs the customer.
